<div class="docs-radical-brownies__wrapper"><style>.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button:hover .toggle-button-svg-fill,.more-docs-dropdown .toggle-button-close:hover .toggle-button-close-svg-fill{fill:#333}section#documentaries.fc-container--thrasher{background-color:#0F0F0F}section#documentaries.fc-container--thrasher .fc-slice__item{margin:0}section#documentaries.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner,section#documentaries.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner .fc-container__body .fc-slice-wrapper .facia-snap,section#documentaries.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner .fc-container__body .fc-slice-wrapper ul{overflow:visible}@media all and (max-width:46.24em){section#documentaries .facia-snap{padding:0}}section#documentaries a.fc-trail__count.fc-trail__count--commentcount{display:none!important}.docs-radical-brownies__wrapper{background-color:#161616;width:100%}.featured-doc{height:320px;display:block;padding:0 20px;position:relative}.featured-doc:before{content:'';position:absolute;top:0;left:0;right:0;width:100%;height:1px;background-color:#fb0;z-index:12}@media all and (max-width:61.24em){.featured-doc{height:240px}}@media all and (max-width:46.24em){.featured-doc{height:260px}}@media all and (max-width:41.24em){.featured-doc{height:350px}}@media all and .background-image{height:240px}}@media all and (max-width:46.24em){.featured-doc .background-image{height:260px}}@media all and (max-width:41.24em){.featured-doc .background-image{opacity:0!important;height:320px}}@media all and (max-width:29.99em){.featured-doc .background-image{height:280px}}.featured-doc-info,.featured-doc-poster,.featured-doc-toggle-more{display:inline-block;margin:10px 10px 0 0;vertical-align:top;width:220px;height:320px;position:relative}.featured-doc-info .docs-logo,.featured-doc-poster .docs-logo,.featured-doc-toggle-more .docs-logo{margin-top:-6px;color:#f4f4f4}@media center;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:100%;display:block;float:left;width:121px;height:68px}@media all and (min-width:46.25em){.featured-doc-info .docs-logo:before,.featured-doc-poster .docs-logo:before,.featured-doc-toggle-more .docs-logo:before{width:141px;height:79px}}@media all and (max-width:41.24em){.featured-doc-poster{width:160px!important;border-left:none;padding-left:0;margin-left:0!important}}@media all and (max-width:29.99em){.featured-doc-poster{width:130px!important}}@media all and (max-width:61.24em){.featured-doc-info,.featured-doc-poster{margin:10px 10px 0;height:auto;width:160px}}@media all and (max-width:46.24em){.featured-doc-info,.featured-doc-poster{margin:10px 8px 0;width:180px}}@media all and (max-width:41.24em){.featured-doc-info,.featured-doc-poster{margin-top:86px;height:215px}}.featured-doc-toggle-more{margin-right:15px}@media all and (max-width:81.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more{width:140px}.featured-doc-toggle-more h2{font-size:20px}}@media all and (max-width:71.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more{width:220px}.featured-doc-toggle-more h2{font-size:22px}}@media all and (max-width:61.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more{margin:10px 10px 0;height:240px;width:160px}}@media all and (max-width:46.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more{margin:10px 8px 0;width:180px;height:260px}.featured-doc-toggle-more h2{font-size:20px}}@media all and (max-width:41.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more{height:340px;position:absolute;top:0}}.featured-doc-toggle-more{margin-left:0}.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button{display:block;padding:0 10px;border:1px solid #f4f4f4;border-radius:100px;position:absolute;bottom:30px}@media all and (max-width:46.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button{bottom:20px}}@media all and (max-width:41.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button{bottom:10px;z-index:9}}.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button-svg{margin:0 5px 0 0;position:relative;top:2px}@media all and (max-width:81.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button-svg{display:none}}@media all and (max-width:71.24em){.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button-svg{display:inline-block}}@media all and (max-width:29.99em){.featured-doc-toggle-more{height:280px}.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button{bottom:-10px}.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button-svg{width:10px;margin-right:0}}.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button-text{display:inline-block;font-family:'Guardian Text Sans Web',serif;font-size:12px;line-height:26px;color:#f4f4f4;margin:0;padding:0}.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button:hover{background:#fff;text-decoration:none;cursor:pointer}.featured-doc-toggle-more .toggle-button:hover .toggle-button-text{color:#333}.featured-doc-poster img{width:220px}@media all and (max-width:61.24em){.featured-doc-poster img{width:160px}}@media all and (max-width:46.24em){.featured-doc-poster img{width:180px}}@media all and (max-width:41.24em){.featured-doc-poster img{border-right:solid .5px #525252;padding:0 8px 0 0;width:160px}}@media all and (max-width:29.99em){.featured-doc-poster img{width:130px}}.featured-doc-info{color:#f4f4f4;font-family:'Guardian Egyptian Web',serif;font-weight:100;font-size:24px;line-height:26px}@media all and (max-width:61.24em){.featured-doc-info{font-size:20px;line-height:22px}}@media all and (max-width:41.24em){.featured-doc-info{width:50%;font-size:22px;line-height:24px;padding-left:0;margin-left:8px}.featured-doc-info-cta{margin-top:10px}}@media all and (max-width:29.99em){.featured-doc-info{width:40%;font-size:16px;line-height:18px}}.featured-doc-info-cta{display:inline-block;border:1px solid #fb0;background-color:#fb0;border-radius:100px;padding:0
